name: Tabletop Simulator: Darkrock Ventures
summary: Only the host needs to own this DLC. 2-5 Players (1-5 Variant available) | Ages 14 & Up 30-45 MinutesAbout Darkrock VenturesDarkrock Ventures is a worker placement board game about deep-space asteroid mining. Each player takes control of their own Asteroid Mining operation with little more than a ship and a skeleton crew.
